GrammarRegistry.name: GrammarRegistry

instanceMethods.name: getGrammars
instanceMethods.summary: Get all the grammars in this registry.
instanceMethods.description: Get all the grammars in this registry.

instanceMethods.name: grammarForScopeName
instanceMethods.summary: Get a grammar with the given scope name.
instanceMethods.description: Get a grammar with the given scope name.

arguments.name: scopeName
arguments.description: A {String} such as `"source.js"`.

instanceMethods.name: removeGrammar
instanceMethods.summary: Remove a grammar from this registry.
instanceMethods.description: Remove a grammar from this registry.

arguments.name: grammar
arguments.description: The {Grammar} to remove.

instanceMethods.name: removeGrammarForScopeName
instanceMethods.summary: Remove the grammar with the given scope name.
instanceMethods.description: Remove the grammar with the given scope name.

arguments.name: scopeName
arguments.description: A {String} such as `"source.js"`.

instanceMethods.name: addGrammar
instanceMethods.summary: Add a grammar to this registry.
instanceMethods.description:
Add a grammar to this registry.

A 'grammar-added' event is emitted after the grammar is added.

arguments.name: grammar
arguments.description: The {Grammar} to add. This should be a value previously returned from {::readGrammar} or {::readGrammarSync}.

instanceMethods.name: readGrammarSync
instanceMethods.summary: Read a grammar synchronously but don't add it to the registry.
instanceMethods.description: Read a grammar synchronously but don't add it to the registry.

arguments.name: grammarPath
arguments.description: A {String} absolute file path to a grammar file.

instanceMethods.name: readGrammar
instanceMethods.summary: Read a grammar asynchronously but don't add it to the registry.
instanceMethods.description: Read a grammar asynchronously but don't add it to the registry.

arguments.name: grammarPath
arguments.description: A {String} absolute file path to a grammar file.

children.name: grammar
children.description: A {Grammar} or null if an error occured.

arguments.name: callback
arguments.description: A {Function} to call when read with the following arguments:

instanceMethods.name: loadGrammarSync
instanceMethods.summary: Read a grammar synchronously and add it to this registry.
instanceMethods.description: Read a grammar synchronously and add it to this registry.

arguments.name: grammarPath
arguments.description: A {String} absolute file path to a grammar file.

instanceMethods.name: loadGrammar
instanceMethods.summary: Read a grammar asynchronously and add it to the registry.
instanceMethods.description: Read a grammar asynchronously and add it to the registry.

arguments.name: grammarPath
arguments.description: A {String} absolute file path to a grammar file.

children.name: grammar
children.description: A {Grammar} or null if an error occured.

arguments.name: callback
arguments.description: A {Function} to call when loaded with the following arguments:

instanceMethods.name: grammarOverrideForPath
instanceMethods.summary: Get the grammar override for the given file path.
instanceMethods.description: Get the grammar override for the given file path.

arguments.name: filePath
arguments.description: A {String} file path.

instanceMethods.name: setGrammarOverrideForPath
instanceMethods.summary: Set the grammar override for the given file path.
instanceMethods.description: Set the grammar override for the given file path.

arguments.name: filePath
arguments.description: A non-empty {String} file path.

arguments.name: scopeName
arguments.description: A {String} such as `"source.js"`.

instanceMethods.name: clearGrammarOverrideForPath
instanceMethods.summary: Remove the grammar override for the given file path.
instanceMethods.description: Remove the grammar override for the given file path.

arguments.name: filePath
arguments.description: A {String} file path.

instanceMethods.name: selectGrammar
instanceMethods.summary: Select a grammar for the given file path and file contents.
instanceMethods.description:
Select a grammar for the given file path and file contents.

This picks the best match by checking the file path and contents against
each grammar.

arguments.name: filePath
arguments.description: A {String} file path.

arguments.name: fileContents
arguments.description: A {String} of text for the file path.

GrammarRegistry.summary: Registry containing one or more grammars.
GrammarRegistry.description: Registry containing one or more grammars.

events.name: grammar-added
events.summary: Fired when a grammar has been added to the registry.
events.description: Fired when a grammar has been added to the registry.

arguments.name: grammar
arguments.description: The {Grammar} that was added.

events.name: grammar-updated
events.summary:
Fired whenever a grammar has been updated due to a grammar it depends on
being added to or removed from the registry.
events.description:
Fired whenever a grammar has been updated due to a grammar it depends on
being added to or removed from the registry.

arguments.name: grammar
arguments.description: The {Grammar} that was updated.

Grammar.name: Grammar

instanceMethods.name: tokenizeLines
instanceMethods.summary: Tokenize all lines in the given text.
instanceMethods.description: Tokenize all lines in the given text.

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: A {String} containing one or more lines.

returnValues.description: Returns an {Array} of token arrays for each line tokenized.

arguments.name: line
arguments.description: A {String} of text to tokenize.

arguments.name: ruleStack
arguments.description: An optional {Array} of rules previously returned from this method. This should be null when tokenizing the first line in the file.

arguments.name: firstLine
arguments.description: A optional {Boolean} denoting whether this is the first line in the file which defaults to `false`. This should be `true` when tokenizing the first line in the file.

returnValues.description:
Returns an {Object} containing the following properties:

* `token` An {Array} of tokens covering the entire line of text.
* `ruleStack` An {Array} of rules representing the tokenized state at the
  end of the line. These should be passed back into this method when
  tokenizing the next line in the file.

Grammar.summary: Grammar that tokenizes lines of text.
Grammar.description:
Grammar that tokenizes lines of text.

This class should not be instantiated directly but instead obtained from
a {GrammarRegistry} by calling {GrammarRegistry::loadGrammar}.
